column4: hey I am trying to tweak my ubuntu to run faster. does any one know a good, recent, reference I could use to achieve my goal of "Fastest Old Computer!"
do you have a url you can point me in the direction? or what window manager would you suggest?

well you should check out tiling window managers like xmonad, awesome, and dwm.  But if you don't like tiling, there are other lightweight window managers (fluxbox, openbox, etc...).  Really, if you want fast, then use light software (lots of terminal stuff, etc.)
